com.dhemery.polling
Class TickingPoller

java.lang.Object
  com.dhemery.polling.ParameterizedPoller
      com.dhemery.polling.TickingPoller
All Implemented Interfaces:
Poller
public class TickingPoller
extends ParameterizedPoller

A poller that uses a ticker to delay between polls, and throws a PollTimeoutException if the ticker expires before the condition is satisfied.
